definition: Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

pinyin: Bo2 de2 li4 Tu2 shu1 guan3

sentences.english: The pictures were given to Associated Press photo editor John Bodkin.
sentences.chinese: 這些照片提供給美聯社照片編輯約翰博德金。

sentences.english: Now this black-and-white Border collie, age seven, knows more than 1, 000 words.
sentences.chinese: 這隻七歲的黑白博德牧羊犬，認得超過千字。

sentences.english: There are already plans for a cowshed in St Moritz and a bodega in northern Spain.
sentences.chinese: 已經有計劃在聖莫里茨牛欄和博德加在西班牙北部。

sentences.english: Bodman stressed that nations must cooperate to succeed.
sentences.chinese: 博德曼強調，各國必須合作才能成功。

sentences.english: Mr Sands said client income at the investment bank was up 20 per cent.
sentences.chinese: 冼博德表示，投資銀行業務的客戶收入增長了20%。

sentences.english: But as Byrd explains, the lead-up to the bout was anything but smooth.
sentences.chinese: 但是，博德解釋說較量的導致結果只有順滑。

sentences.english: It's gone. You're building a rat ship here, a vessel for seagoing snitches.
sentences.chinese: 現在博德培養的是一羣膽小如鼠，賣友求榮的傢伙。

sentences.english: Mr. Bodman disagreed, saying: 'I think it was unrelated to the hurricanes.
sentences.chinese: 博德曼不同意這種看法，他認爲油價上漲與颶風無關。

definition: Clark T. Randt Jr. (1945-), US ambassador to Beijing 2001-2009
Logue or Rogge (name)/Jacques Rogge, president of International Olympic Committee (IOC)
